channel.title: CVE Feed for Joomla! Project -- Joomla! CMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Joomla! Project -- Joomla! CMS

item.title: CVE-2024-26279|2024-07-09T17:48:59.108Z -- joomla%21%20project -- joomla%21%20cms
item.description: Inadequate content filtering leads to XSS vulnerabilities in various components.
